enter-vin.title: Your vehicle information number
enter-vin.subtitle: Either enter your vin in the text field below or take a picture of it to use the VIN OCR technology. (beta)
enter-vin.notfound: The vehicle details were not found, please enter your vehicle information through the vehicle make/model/year selection
enter-vin.imagenotfound: A valid VIN was not found, please try uploading another image or use one of the other options provided

vehicle-details.title: Your vehicle
vehicle-details.subtitle: Let's gather the vehicle details. Please begin by choosing one of the options below.

instructions.title: Thank you for supplying your vehicle info
instructions.take-photos: Now it's time to take some photos of the vehicle
instructions.photo-notice: Taking the right photos is crucial so kindly click on the photo tips to view the guideline to click images of the vehicle.

photo-tips.content: Your camera should be pointed directly at the damage on your vehicle.
photo-tips.title: Photo tips
photo-tips.content-1: Your camera should be pointed directly at the vehicle with the damage at your eye level.
photo-tips.content-2: Take photos outside the car and 5 feet away (2 meters). Taking images from too close or too far should be avoided.
photo-tips.content-3: Take photos in a well lit environment. Please avoid images with reflections, glare or dark exposure.
photo-tips.content-4: Clean all mud/dirt/snow/fluids covering the outside of the car. Remove any tape, adhesive sticks or other foreign objects attached to the surface of the vehicle.
photo-tips.title-5: Do not obstruct view of vehicle
photo-tips.content-5: Remove any objects that are obstructing the view of the vehicle including body parts (human or otherwise), other people or reflections of the photographer

photo-upload.title: Photo upload
photo-upload.subtitle: Take photos or upload them from your library.
photo-upload.photos-uploaded: The photos are being uploaded and analyzed. It may take some time.
photo-upload.snack-message: A server error occurred. Please contact an administrator if this problem persists.
photo-upload.upload-failure: There was a problem uploading your pictures. Please try again
photo-upload.upload-error: Error while attempting to upload photos. Please try again.

analysis-result.title: Information Received
analysis-result.subtitle: Thank you for submitting the information for your {{incidentType}}. Someone from {{clientName}} will be in contact with you shortly.
analysis-result.alert-message: By clicking back you will lose the in progress submission and will be starting a new submission.
analysis-result.rejected-alert-message: Please click on the question mark on the image to check why the image was rejected.
